name: Alaan
headline: AI-powered expense management platform for businesses in the Middle√¢¬Ä¬¶
description:
Alaan is an AI-powered expense management platform for businesses in the Middle East. We help businesses instantly issue corporate cards for employees, control their spending, and automate receipts. 

Our mission is to simplify finance for businesses in the Middle East and help them prosper. We have grown rapidly and now work with over 500 startups, mid-market, and enterprise customers across various industries, doing tens of millions of dollars in payment volume. We've been default alive since our launch in August 2022 (9x net revenue growth in 2023, 6x in 2024).

Check out alaan.com/careers if you want to join us!

founders.name: Parthi Duraisamy, Founder
founders.description: Parthi is an Electrical Engineer but has worn many hats √¢¬Ä¬ì a farmer, an engineer, tech @ investment banking, and a McKinsey consultant. He graduated from the National University of Singapore and has an MBA from the Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth College. Loves skiing!

founders.name: Karun Kurien, Founder
founders.description: Karun started his career as a software engineer and then spent a few years consulting with McKinsey Digital. Most recently, he has focussed on building products for startups. He now leads product and tech. at Alaan.

**Alaan: Simplifying Business Finance in the Middle East**

Alaan is an innovative fintech company that launched in August 2022, founded in 2021 as part of Y Combinator's Batch W23. Based in Dubai, UAE, it has rapidly gained traction, servicing over 500 startups, mid-market, and enterprise customers. With a mission to simplify finance for businesses across the Middle East, Alaan offers an AI-powered expense management platform that allows companies to issue corporate cards, control spending, and automate receipt management. In just a short time, they‚Äôve achieved remarkable growth, boasting a 9x net revenue increase in 2023 alone. 

### What They Do

Alaan‚Äôs core offerings include:
- **Smart Corporate Cards:** Businesses can instantly issue corporate cards with customizable spending limits, making it easier for employees to manage expenses without straying off-track.
- **Expense Management:** Alaan provides real-time visibility and control over spending, ensuring that every dirham is accounted for. 
- **Accounting Automation:** The platform seamlessly integrates with major ERP systems, facilitating quicker reconciliations and reducing manual bookkeeping.

### Customer Success Stories

Alaan‚Äôs solutions are already making waves. For example, **Washmen** reported saving over 80 hours per week since utilizing Alaan‚Äôs spend management, allowing their team to focus on core activities without worry over spending policies. Similarly, **Al Barari** and **HelloChef** highlighted significant improvements in transparency and reduced reimbursement times, proving the efficacy of Alaan's platform.

### Team and Vision

With a passionate team of around 72 employees, led by Group Partner Michael Seibel, Alaan is on a growth trajectory. Their vision aligns with the broader trends in fintech, aiming for a cashless future. By providing streamlined financial management tools, they cater to various industries including healthcare, logistics, and real estate.

### Join the Movement

Alaan is currently looking for talent to join their dynamic team. If you‚Äôre interested in being part of a company that‚Äôs reshaping financial processes in the Middle East, check their careers page at [alaan.com/careers](https://www.alaan.com/).

In a market dominated by traditional finance, Alaan's innovative approach and impressive growth showcase the significant potential for change in how businesses manage their expenses, saving both time and resources. 

**Website:** [Alaan](https://www.alaan.com/) 

This is fintech evolution for the Middle East‚Äîare you ready to harness it?
